statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (14,-6) and (5,5).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{{5}-{\left(-{6}\right)}}}{{{5}-{\left({14}\right)}}}=\frac{{11}}{{-{{9}}}} which reduces to \displaystyle-\frac{{11}}{{9}} (if it's not already reduced)
